===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|戌|口|t1=axe|t2=mouth (person) or clay pot|ls=ic}}. To cut off one's head with an ax, depriving them of all they have; alternatively, to break a pot with an ax.

{{Han simp|鹹|f1=鹵|t1=(none)}} as well.
